0000000_00000_00000_000_00101_0010011  // 0: addi x5, x0, 0 (branch)
// 0000011_00000_00000_000_00101_0010011  // 0: addi x5, x0, 3 (no branch)
0000000_00000_00000_000_00110_0010011  // 1: addi x6, x0, 0

0000000_00001_00110_000_00110_0010011  // 3: addi x6, x6, 1
0000000_00001_00110_000_00110_0010011  // 4: addi x6, x6, 1
